title: Ranked Treeline - Teemo - No Vision Items
body:
That's pretty much it. First, thanks for adding flex on Treeline. That said, Teemo is running amuck in his yordle finest. He's either an instaban or else he just poops shrooms everywhere without a counter item left on that map for vision.

Yes, there is the occasional glittery sparkle thing you can do in bushes...but that is hardly enough to counter.

Can we get a vision item on TT?

replies.body: so u want to fck over teemo even more? </3

> [{quoted}](name=SpiritOfFizz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6i7ygAcw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-25T20:19:16.546+0000)
>
> so u want to fck over teemo even more? </3

yes
